title: How do I fix the high squealing my pixel 2 makes when the screen is on?
content:
The squealing started over a month ago.  It occurs everytime I turn my screen on.  The sound stops when I turn off the screen or when I turn on the flashlight (strangely enough).
I've tried turning off NFC, Bluetooth, and WiFi.  Just as well I restarted it multiple times and made sure it was completely up to date.
